headline.main: Afghan Family With U.S. Visas Detained on Arrival in Los Angeles
headline.print_headline: Afghan Family With U.S. Visas Detained on Arrival in Los Angeles

lead_paragraph: U.S. agents detained an Afghan family of five with valid entry visas at Los Angeles International Airport and have been holding them for several days in California, according to legal papers filed in federal court by human rights lawyers.
snippet: U.S. agents detained an Afghan family of five with valid entry visas at Los Angeles International Airport and have been holding them for several days in California, according to legal papers filed in federal court by human rights lawyers....
